dictionary.definition: A gay man who prefers to be in the company of straight women.
An encounter with a prostitute that incorporates both oral sex and intercourse.
A fetish for committing sins, as defined by your religious upbringing. Synonyms: pecattiphilia.
1. Using one's hands to bring a partner to orgasm. Usually refers to stroking a penis. 2. Masturbation.
A group of women or men a powerful person keeps at his disposal to service his sexual needs on demand.
A fetish for using or drinking blood in a sexual manner.
Sexually aroused. Synonyms: bulging, dripping, estrus, frisky, fuckish, gamy, hot, hot and bothered.
An absurd sex act in which the magician starts out penetrating his partner from behind. He then secretly allows an accomplice to take his place without the bottom partner realizing it.
A woman whose bust measurement is nearly identical to her hip measurement, with a substantially smaller waist. Ex. 36-24-36.
A type of fetish play in which the submissive partner is made to feel ashamed or degraded.
Having a penis large enough to belong to a beast of burden.
A person with an hyperactive sex drive.
A fetish for touching skin, hair, leather, fur, or fabric. Similar to doraphilia.
